subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic of Serbia defeated Feliciano López of Spain, 7-6 (4), 6-2, to win the Serbia Open in Belgrade for his fifth title and 27th straight victory this season.
snippet: Novak Djokovic of Serbia defeated Feliciano López of Spain, 7-6 (4), 6-2, to win the Serbia Open in Belgrade for his fifth title and 27th straight victory this season.
